title: Governance Threshold Configuration Manifest Schema
description: Defines the required operational constraints (Utility_Min, Exposure_Max) for P-01 arbitration, derived from the Governance Threshold Configuration Manifest (GTCM).

version.description: Manifest version corresponding to the current V_N system iteration.

utilityConstraints.description: Constraints governing S-01 (Efficacy Projection) reported by SDR.

Utility_Min.description: The absolute minimum acceptable threshold for S-01 output. Must be non-negative.

Utility_Baseline_V94.description: Optional baseline reference value for S-01 stability assessment.

riskConstraints.description: Constraints governing S-02 (Risk Synthesis) reported by HMC.

Exposure_Max.description: The absolute maximum acceptable threshold for S-02 output. Must be non-negative.

Tolerance_Level.description: Overall risk tolerance categorization for the system iteration.

complianceBinding.description: Reference identifier linking the active compliance framework (AOC).

ratificationTimestamp.description: Timestamp of GSEP L6 ratification of this constraint set.
